ModMetaData.name: [XND] Adjustable Predator Count
ModMetaData.author: XeoNovaDan
ModMetaData.description:
Current version: v1.1 (30th July 2019)

A small mod that allows you to globally adjust the likelihood of which predators will spawn in biomes. Works with both vanilla and modded animals.

No predators? No problem. Want loads of predators? Go right ahead!
